entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is standing with her back to them at the far end of the corridor.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Hermione whispered to Ginny as they passed her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is whispering to Ginny and giving instructions to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is approaching Umbridge's door with Hermione.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Hermione mentions that they should sing 'Weasley Is Our King' if they see Umbridge coming.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry inserts the blade of Sirius's knife in the crack between door and wall.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: The song 'Weasley Is Our King' is mentioned as a signal to sing if they see Umbridge coming.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are moving forward together, covered by the cloak.
Hermione is whispering to Ginny as they pass her.
Harry is approaching Umbridge's door with Hermione.
Hermione is using the knife of Sirius to open the lock.
